name: tributePage
description: First of all, you need ```git, node``` installed on your machine before clone this project. ___ After that, you can see all the scaffold you had on this project: ```     |- app/         |- assets/             |- css/                 |- main.css /*Your styles should go here!*/             |- fonts/             |- img/             |- icons/         |- index.html /* Your html syntax should go here! */         |- index.js /* If you have any js code for your tribute, that should be here! */ ```
